bib.title: Large-scale experiments with NP chunking of Polish
bib.author: Radziszewski, Adam and Pawlaczek, Adam
bib.abstract: Next, we joined several types of syntactic groups to form a large type which we labelled  simply as noun phrases (NP chunks). Our main  A preliminary noun phrase chunker for Polish.  In: Proceedings of the Intelligent Information Systems (2010) 9. Maziarz, M., Radziszewski, A
bib.booktitle: International Conference on Text, Speech and Dialogue
